src:
Peyton Reed Kembali Sutradarai 'Ant-Man 3'
04 Nov 2019, 11:16 by , https://www.facebook.com/CNNIndonesia


Film 'Ant-Man 3' telah memiliki sutradara. Diduga, wajah-wajah lama akan muncul lagi di film mendatang. (dok. Marvel)

Jakarta, CNN Indonesia -- Kisah pahlawan super Ant-Man sepertinya akan berlanjut ke film ketiga. Setelah muncul beberapa rumor, akhirnya Ant-Man 3 memiliki sutradara.Melansir The Hollywood Reporter, Peyton Reed akan menjadi sutradara Ant-Man 3. Ia tidak asing dengan pahlawan super berkostum semut itu karena sebelumnya menyutradarai Ant-Man (2015) dan Ant-Man and the Wasp (2018).Pemilihan Reed sebagai sutradara sangat tepat karena ia sudah mengetahui karakter film Ant-Man. Kemungkinan Ant-Man 3 bakal meraup sukses di tangan Reed sangat besar.Selain itu, aktor Paul Rudd diperkirakan akan kembali berperan sebagai Scott Lang alias Ant-Man. Bila benar terjadi, itu akan menjadi kemunculan Rudd untuk kelima kali sebagai Ant-Man di film Marvel Cinematic Universe (MCU).Belum diketahui seperti apa jalan cerita Ant-Man 3. Setelah Ant-Man and the Wasp (2018), Ant-Man berhasil keluar dari alam quantum dan membantu Avengers melawan Thanos dalam Avengers: Endgame.


Film 'Ant Man and the Wasp' diduga masih akan menampilkan wajah-wajah lama. (dok. Marvel)

Pun begitu dengan Hank Pym (Michael Douglas), Janet Van Dyne (Michelle Pfeiffer) dan Hope van Dyne (Evangeline Lilly). Mereka yang mati dalam Ant-Man and the Wasp (2018) diceritakan kembali hidup dalam Avengers: Endgame.Lebih lanjut, sumber The Hollywood Reporter menjelaskan Ant-Man 3 akan mulai syuting pada akhir 2020 atau awal 2021. Film tersebut direncanakan rilis pada 2022.Film seri Ant-Man merupakan salah satu film yang sukses diantara film-film MCU. Ant-Man yang berbujet USD130 juta berhasil meraup pendapatan sebesar USD519 juta, sementara Ant-Man and the Wasp memperoleh pendapatan sebesar USD622 juta. (adp/rea)
text:
Peyton Reed Directed 'Ant-Man 3'
Nov 04 2019, 11:16 by, https://www.facebook.com/CNNIndonesia


The film 'Ant-Man 3' already has a director. Allegedly, old faces will appear again in the upcoming film. (doc. Marvel)

Jakarta, CNN Indonesia - The story of the super hero Ant-Man is likely to continue into the third film. After several rumors emerged, finally Ant-Man 3 had a director. Reporting to The Hollywood Reporter, Peyton Reed would become the director of Ant-Man 3. He was no stranger to the super hero wearing the ant costume because he previously directed Ant-Man (2015) and Ant-Man and the Wasp (2018). Reed's selection as a director is very appropriate because he already knows the character of the Ant-Man film. The possibility of Ant-Man 3 will reap success in the hands of Reed is very large. In addition, actor Paul Rudd is expected to return to the role of Scott Lang alias Ant-Man. If this happens, it will be the appearance of Rudd for the fifth time as Ant-Man in the film Marvel Cinematic Universe (MCU). Not yet known what the storyline Ant-Man 3. After Ant-Man and the Wasp (2018), Ant-Man made it out of the quantum realm and helped the Avengers fight Thanos in Avengers: Endgame.


The film 'Ant Man and the Wasp' is thought to still be showing old faces. (doc. Marvel)

Even so with Hank Pym (Michael Douglas), Janet Van Dyne (Michelle Pfeiffer) and Hope van Dyne (Evangeline Lilly). Those who die in Ant-Man and the Wasp (2018) are retold alive in Avengers: Endgame. Furthermore, sources from The Hollywood Reporter explain Ant-Man 3 will begin shooting in late 2020 or early 2021. The film is planned for release in 2022. The Ant-Man film series is one of the successful films among MCU films. Ant-Man with a budget of USD 130 million managed to reap revenues of USD 519 million, while Ant-Man and the Wasp earned revenues of USD 622 million. (adp / rea)
